      • getMinReplicationFactor

        public abstract int getMinReplicationFactor(Layout layout,
                                            Layout.LayoutStripe stripe)
        Compute the min replication factor for the log unit servers in the replication protocol for a specific stripe.
        Parameters:
        layout - the layout to compute the min replication factor for.
        stripe - The stripe for which the minimum replication factor is needed.
        Returns:
        the minimum amount of nodes required to maintain replication
